item.title: California fires weather forecast: LA remains under extreme dry and windy weather
item.description: On Wednesday morning and afternoon, winds will be the strongest west and north of Los Angeles, mostly in the mountains and higher canyons.

item.title: 'Scam Goddess' explores city worker's 22-year deception
item.description: Rita Crundwell used her position as Dixon, Illinois, comptroller and treasurer to embezzle $53.7 million for her Quarter Horse breeding operation and ...

item.title: Duck hunters discover human remains deep in wooded area on hunting trip
item.description: Two local duck hunters in North Carolina ended up discovering human remains during an outing earlier this week, police said.

item.title: LA fires live updates: At least 25 fire-related deaths, medical examiner says
item.description: At least 25 people are believed to be dead and more than a dozen others remain unaccounted for as multiple wildfires rage across Southern California.

item.title: The long struggle to establish Martin Luther King Jr. Day
item.description: On the third Monday of the month, federal, state and local governments, institutions and various industries recognize Martin Luther King Jr. Day
